name: DrugWars - RPG
description: This is a prototype  I have been working on for the last few months. I've always wanted to try my hand at remaking the infamous "Drug Wars" economy game that we all played on the calculator back in the day, and thought it could be fun to add a point & click twist. This is sort of an exploration for me so i'm not entirely sure where this is going, but wanted a place to share my progress. I would love to hear feedback as I post builds!
